title: 7.1 login problem
body:
hello everyone
I have a problem when i try to login on patch 7.1 it wont enter me to the game it says unable to connect to login queue and check the status of the server, the status is online and am 100% sure of my user name and password, sometimes it enter me and most the times it wont enable me to enter


I hope someone solve this problem for me and thank you.

replies.body: It might be the region it is set in i just check mine and it was set in oceana for some reason then i changed it NA then my user and pass worked

Interesting. It sounds like your issue may be caused by an *unstable connection* to our login servers since you only see the issue periodically. I recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it covers network configurations that commonly cause these problems.

Hit me back on here if you still have issues after following those steps.
I still have the same problem :(

We'll need to take a thorough look at your network and system logs to determine what's still an issue at this point. I'd recommend you run some logs with our [**Hextech Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech team members can get back in touch with you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
